title: The Testament Of Sherlock Holmes
description:
1898, London. All the evidence of police investigation points at Sherlock Holmes as the main suspect in a case involving theft, fraud and double-crossings. Unable to prove his own innocence, Holmes is rapidly losing LondonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s trust as doubt spreads through the city like wildfire. Even Doctor Watson's faith in his friend begins to waver, as the famous detective flees Scotland Yard and raises further suspicion; prowling around at night, destruction of evidence... would Holmes go so far as to commit murder? 

Release Date: September 25, 2012 
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Use of Drugs 
Genre: Adventure 
Publisher: Atlus 
Developer: Frogwares
